functionDecorators.name: etherBalance
functionDecorators.description: Get the Ether balance for all addresses specified.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to get the Ether balance for.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The Ether balance for all addresses in the same order as specified.

functionDecorators.name: items
functionDecorators.description: Get the ERC-721 token balance of `token` for all addresses specified. This does not check if the `token` address specified is actually an ERC-20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to get the token balance for.

parameterDecorators.name: contracts
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the ERC-721 token contracts.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The token balance for all addresses in the same order as specified.

functionDecorators.name: tokens
functionDecorators.description: Get the ERC-20 token balance of `token` for all addresses specified. This does not check if the `token` address specified is actually an ERC-20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to get the token balance for.

parameterDecorators.name: contracts
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the ERC-20 token contracts.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The token balance for all addresses in the same order as specified.
